data.eml:eml: A new species of Andean poison frog, Andinobates (Anura: Dendrobatidae), from the northwestern Andes of Colombia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Amézquita, Adolfo, Márquez, Roberto, Medina, Ricardo, Mejía-Vargas, Daniel, Kahn, Ted R., Suárez, Gustavo, Mazariegos, Luis (2013): A new species of Andean poison frog, Andinobates (Anura: Dendrobatidae), from the northwestern Andes of Colombia. Zootaxa 3620 (1): 163-178, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3620.1.8
